title: FS: Christy Mathewson Postcards and Premium
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: Christy Mathewson Postcards and Premium
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,
Putting these beauties up for sale, all pieces include the great Christy Mathewson!

• C.1913 E.C. Kropp Giants Postcard - [STRIKE]$850 USD[/STRIKE] SOLD (general wear, crease top right corner)
• 1915 Baseball Magazine Christy Mathewson Premium - [STRIKE]$700 USD[/STRIKE] $575 USD (would look nice framed to hide uneven removal from the magazine)

All prices include Shipping from Canada with tracking and insurance. Lifted these photos from my site, I can dig these out of the vault and get some back scans if requested. PM or post if interested and thanks for looking!
Jeff
I would also consider trades for PSA graded basketball cards!

Hi guys,
Prices are negotiable, feel free to throw some offers my way so don't be shy! Would also look at potential trades for graded HOF basketball players from the 1970's to the 1990's.
Jeff

Great items that don't come up for sale often, if interested we can work on the prices or throw around some trade possibilities... in the mood for wheelin' & dealin'!
Jeff

Dropping the price a bit on these.
Jeff

Kropp Giants postcard has sold. Don't be shy, let me know if you're interested. Cheers guys!
Jeff

Christy Mathewson Premium is still available, price is negotiable so feel free to give me a shout! Peace!
Jeff
